dataElement.name: Deaths due to Road Traffic Injuries

reportTemplate.name: MOH 705 A Outpatient Summary under 5 years

dataValueTemplate.annotation: select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id = 5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (962,1003,1004,1215,1678,4029,4421,5018,148023,1228,4371,4131,4056,4034,1081,1228,117889) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) diagnosis

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (572,1010,1163,1213,1245,1470,1525,1527,1707,1708, 1752,2345,3860,4059,4060,4061,4148,4298,4316,4425,4592,152306,160156,4047,4542,1164) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs o INNER JOIN person p ON o.person_id=p.person_id AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 AND DATE(death_date)=DATE(obs_datetime) INNER JOIN encounter e ON e.encounter_id=o.encounter_id AND (e.encounter_type=6 OR e.encounter_type=9)
WHERE concept_id=11 AND value_coded=1028 AND obs_datetime BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1068,100126201) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (4270,1088,4547,206,143388,1349,1928,4102,2177) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1148,160158) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 AND p.person_id NOT IN ( SELECT person_id FROM obs WHERE concept_id = 5109 AND value_coded IN (1148,160158) AND DATE(obs_datetime) < :startOfPeriod) group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249 ) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1001065,4576) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) brucellosis;

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1194) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (4593,1755,1182,1449,1097,1753,1754,4062,113230) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM obs o INNER JOIN person p ON o.person_id=p.person_id AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 AND DATE(death_date)=DATE(obs_datetime) INNER JOIN encounter e ON e.encounter_id=o.encounter_id AND (e.encounter_type=6 OR e.encounter_type=9)
WHERE concept_id=11 AND value_coded=4021 AND obs_datetime BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1157) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

) autism;

select count(person_id) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id WHERE o.voided = 0 AND (o.concept_id=5109 or o.concept_id = 2304 or o.concept_id = 160249) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1709) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) a;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT patient_id, MIN(encounter_datetime) first_encounter_date FROM encounter e
INNER JOIN person p ON e.patient_id=p.person_id AND encounter_type IN (9,21)
GROUP BY patient_id, birthdate
HAVING TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthdate, MIN(encounter_datetime)) <= 5 AND MIN(first_encounter_date) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) AS new;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DATE(encounter_datetime), patient_id FROM encounter e INNER JOIN person p ON e.patient_id=p.person_id AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, DATE(encounter_datetime)) <= 5 WHERE CONCAT(DATE(encounter_datetime),'-',e.patient_id) IN ( SELECT CONCAT(MIN(DATE(encounter_datetime)), '-', patient_id)first_date FROM encounter e WHERE encounter_type IN (9,21) GROUP BY patient_id ) AND DATE(encounter_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND encounter_type IN (9,21) GROUP BY DATE(encounter_datetime), patient_id ) AS revisits;

select count(*) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(o.obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id where o.concept_id = 5 and o.value_coded in (4008,4009,4010) and date(o.obs_datetime) between :startOfPeriod and :endOfPeriod and EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) from_health_facility

select count(*) from ( select o.person_id, date_format(o.obs_datetime, '%d-%m-%Y') obs_date from obs o inner join person p on p.person_id = o.person_id where o.concept_id = 3004 and o.value_coded in (4008,4009,4010) and date(o.obs_datetime) between :startOfPeriod and :endOfPeriod and EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) <= 5 group by o.person_id, obs_date ) to_health_facility
